title: 317A.601 MERGER, CONSOLIDATION, OR TRANSFER.
text:
Two or more corporations may merge or consolidate, resulting in a single corporation subject to this chapter. A merger or consolidation must be made as provided in sections 317A.611 to 317A.651.
A corporation may sell, lease, transfer, or dispose of all or substantially all of its property and assets under section 317A.661.
If applicable, a corporation shall comply with section 317A.811 before it may merge or consolidate or transfer all or substantially all of its assets.
